com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.input
Class InputConverter

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.input.InputConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IInputConverter
Direct Known Subclasses:
KeyInputConverter, MouseInputConverter
public abstract class InputConverter
extends Object
implements IInputConverter

InputConverter implements IInputConverter to define the basic abstraction of an converter that converts jME input events into FengGUI events.

Version:
Creation date: 07-11-2008 16:53 EST, Modified date: 07-21-2008 12:11 EST
Author:
Yi Wang (Neakor)
